title: Robin Goodfellow's racing tips: Best bets for Friday, October 11
text:
Sportsmail's racing expert Robin Goodfellow dishes out his tips for Friday's meetings at Chepstow, Newcastle, Newmarket and York.

There were shades of Frankel’s brilliance at Newbury last month in the form of his talented daughter Quadrilateral (Newmarket, 3.35) and it will be fascinating to see if she truly is Group One class.

Victory in the bet365 Fillies Mile would go some way to erasing Sunday’s defeat of Enable for the Juddmonte Farms operation.

Sportsmail's racing expert Robin Goodfellow dishes out his tips for Friday's meetings

Quadrilateral powered clear of six toiling rivals on her latest start. She scored by more than nine lengths in the manner of a horse going places and, if she can transfer that flat-track form to the undulations of Newmarket, she could set down a marker for next year’s 1,000 Guineas.

The presence of the Jessica Harrington-trained Cayenne Pepper will concern connections of Quadrilateral, given the stable lifted one of the season’s premier juvenile prizes a fortnight ago.

CHEPSTOW

ROBIN GOODFELLOW 2.10 Trevelyn’s Corn 2.45 Flic Ou Voyou 3.20 Lisnagar Oscar (nb) 3.55 The Young Master 4.30 King D’Argent 5.00 Silent Steps 5.35 Silver Forever GIMCRACK 2.10 Harambe 2.45 Proschema 3.20 Lisnagar Oscar 3.55 Henryville 4.30 Praeceps 5.00 Silent Steps 5.35 Early Days

NEWMARKET

ROBIN GOODFELLOW 1.50 Platinum Star 2.25 Final Song 3.00 Mustashry 3.35 Quadrilateral 4.10 Trueshan 4.45 Waliyak 5.20 Simply Beautiful NEWMARKET – 5.20 Fanny Logan (nap GIMCRACK 1.50 Lazuli (nb) 2.25 Final Song 3.00 Shine So Bright 3.35 Cayenne Pepper (nap) 4.10 Apparate 4.45 Beauty Stone 5.20 Fanny Logan

YORK
